title: Feet ⇄ Meters Converter
description: Instantly convert between feet, meters, inches, and centimeters.
lede: Quickly convert imperial ↔ metric for DIY, travel, and work.
steps: Choose the units to convert from and to.
tips: Round to practical precision for cutting materials.

title: Paint Needed Calculator
description: Estimate gallons of paint required by area, coats, and coverage.
lede: Avoid extra trips—estimate paint before you buy.
steps: Measure wall area in square feet.
Calculate to see gallons and cans.
tips: Add 10% for texture or rough walls.
Primer may improve coverage and reduce coats.

title: Board Feet Calculator
description: Compute board feet from thickness, width, and length.
lede: Plan lumber purchases accurately for your next build.
steps: Measure thickness and width in inches.
tips: Buy 10–15% extra to account for defects.
Confirm if seller bills by board feet or by piece.

title: Shipping Dimensional Weight Calculator
description: Calculate billable weight for air or ground using divisors.
lede: Estimate carrier-billed weight and avoid surprises.
steps: Pick divisor for air or ground.
tips: Carriers round up to the next pound.
Use the smallest box that protects your item.

title: Bicycle Gear Inches Calculator
description: Compute gear inches from chainring, cog, and wheel size.
lede: Compare setups and feel before you swap cogs.
steps: Enter front and rear teeth count.
tips: Bigger gear inches = harder but faster.
Try multiple cogs to match your terrain.

title: Room AC BTU Calculator
description: Estimate cooling capacity needed by room size and exposure.
lede: Right‑size your portable or window AC unit.
tips: High ceilings need more capacity.
South‑facing rooms get hotter in summer.

title: Cut‑List Optimizer (1D)
description: Best‑fit cut plan for lumber with kerf and waste.
lede: Enter stock length, kerf, and required cuts to minimize waste.
steps: Paste your required cuts, one per line.
Click Optimize to get boards and waste.
tips: Add 5–10% contingency for defects.
Group similar cuts to reduce setup time.

title: Box‑Fit & Rotation Planner
description: Find which boxes fit and compute DIM weight.
lede: Try all rotations, see fit, empty volume, and dimensional weight.
tips: Smaller boxes reduce DIM charges.
Add padding clearance when choosing a box.

title: Tile & Flooring Planner
description: Coverage, cuts, and suggested boxes with waste.
lede: Estimate tile count, stagger, and edge cuts.
steps: Enter tile size and grout width.
tips: Order extra for breakage and pattern matching.
Dry‑lay a small area to verify offsets.

title: Batch Unit Converter
description: Convert dozens of values in one go.
lede: Paste a list and get bulk conversions to the unit you need.
tips: Use short units like ft, in, cm, m.
Export results into spreadsheets.

title: 3D Print Spool Manager
description: Track remaining grams and length per spool (local only).
lede: Estimate remaining meters and log usage—saved in your browser.
steps: Add or update a spool with weight and material.
tips: Weigh empty spools for accuracy.
Material density varies by brand.

title: PC Airflow & PSU Estimator
description: Quick airflow sufficiency check and PSU headroom.
lede: Estimate intake CFM and recommended PSU wattage.
steps: Review airflow verdict and PSU size.
tips: Aim for 20–30% PSU headroom.
High‑density filters reduce CFM.

title: Sheet Optimizer (2D)
description: Kerf-aware cut planner for sheet goods with visual layout.
lede: Paste part sizes and get a visual cut plan across sheets.
tips: Group similar parts to simplify cuts.
Add margin if your saw kerf varies.

title: Project Quote & BOM Builder
description: Paste items, taxes, markup—get a clean quote & CSV export.
lede: Build estimates fast and export a ready-to-send CSV.
tips: Use separate labor line-items.
Save your common parts list in a note for reuse.
